roleset.name: to shrink back, as in fear

example.name: intransitive
example.text: When he later sided with striking hospital workers [] , some allies [*ICH*]cringed a little more , concerned that Mr. Dinkins was setting the wrong tone for coming contract negotiations with city employees .
example.arg: When he later sided with striking hospital workers
concerned that Mr. Dinkins was setting the wrong tone for coming contract negotiations with city employees

roleset.note: CRINGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cringe' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from cringe.01-v predicate notes)
